description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 5/18/2006

To show her appreciation of Brooke and how she has helped Ridge, Stephanie decides to make Brooke the new CEO of Forrester Creations. Ridge, Thorne and Eric are shocked to hear the news but they are supportive and can’t wait to surprise Brooke with the news in a press conference in front of everyone.  Ridge credits his improvement to R.J. and Brooke. Jackie offers Brooke to come on board at Jackie M and help them globalize it.
